message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product for $13,000. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this price reflects its worth.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and deliver immense value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be careful with my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
